description: Ok guys, if you want to see what we think is one of the hottestpairings in the entire history of fisting, you have to see this! RagingStallion exclusive discovery Wilhelm Dragon (you loved his pairingwith Shane Rollins in ToolBox #1: Drilled) gives a performance thatmay very well be one of the best of all time. No music here, Wilhelm'sfilthy mouth runs rampant as he practically yells at Eric to punch himharder. And Eric Evans, one of the hottest studs in all of porn, rises tothe occasion and powerfists Dragon for almost an hour! This is anaward-winner if there ever was one! You have to buy this movie forthis scene alone!
title: Toolbox 2 - Hammered
